en-US.name: Droid Pack
en-US.summary: This gives you access to all of the droids in the Star Wars universe.
en-US.description: You can now ask about any of the droids you have seen in Star Wars.
examplePhrases: Alexa, give me the droid pack.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The droid pack gives you access to the huge number of droids in the Star Wars universe, including C-3PO, BB-8, and many more.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: You now own the droid pack.

testingInstructions: This is the instructions for testing.
